statements: SELECT * FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY SampleDate DESC;
SELECT SampleID, pH, MoistureLevel FROM SoilSamples WHERE pH > 6;
SELECT SampleDate, FieldID, pH FROM SoilSamples WHERE MoistureLevel < 30;
SELECT SampleID, JSONB_VALUE(NutrientLevels,'$.Nitrogen') AS NitrogenLevel FROM SoilSamples WHERE FieldID = 'e066e5c0-9bb9-4c6e-a82a-cbbe552c62c5';
SELECT FieldID, AVG(pH) AS AvgpH FROM SoilSamples GROUP BY FieldID ORDER BY AvgpH DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE pH > 7.0 ORDER BY SampleDate DESC
SELECT SampleID, FieldID, SampleDate FROM SoilSamples WHERE NutrientLevels->>'nitrogen' > '5'
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE MoistureLevel < 0.2 ORDER BY SampleDate ASC
SELECT SampleID, FieldID, SampleDate, pH, MoistureLevel FROM SoilSamples WHERE SampleDate BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT SampleID, FieldID, SampleDate, jsonb_array_elements_text(NutrientLevels) AS nutrient FROM SoilSamples WHERE NutrientLevels->>'phosphorus' > '3.0'
SELECT * FROM field_data;
SELECT field_name, pH_level, sample_date FROM field_data WHERE pH_level > 7.0;
SELECT researcher_name, field_of_study FROM research_team;
SELECT field_name, sample_date, nutrient_levels FROM field_data ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_team WHERE field_of_study = 'Botany';
SELECT * FROM field_data WHERE pH_level > 7 ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, field_of_study, contact_email FROM research_team WHERE researcher_id = 5;
SELECT field_name, nutrient_levels FROM field_data WHERE field_name ILIKE 'soil%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM field_data WHERE nutrient_levels ->> 'nitrogen' = 'high' AND nutrient_levels ->> 'phosphorus' = 'low';
SELECT researcher_name, field_of_study, contact_email FROM research_team WHERE field_of_study = 'Botany' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Field_Samples;
SELECT field_id, sample_date, pH_level FROM Field_Samples ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT sample_id, organic_matter FROM Field_Samples WHERE pH_level > 7;
SELECT field_name, field_location FROM Fields WHERE field_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT sample_id, sample_date FROM Field_Samples ORDER BY sample_date DESC, sample_id ASC;
SELECT field_name, field_location FROM Fields WHERE field_location LIKE 'USA%';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email, researcher_affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_affiliation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT pH_level, organic_matter FROM Field_Samples WHERE pH_level > 6.5 AND organic_matter < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Field_Samples JOIN Fields ON Field_Samples.field_id = Fields.field_id;
SELECT * FROM fields;
SELECT field_name, soil_type FROM fields WHERE soil_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM fields ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples WHERE ph_level > 6.5;
SELECT research_area, researcher_name FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM fields ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT field_name, soil_type FROM fields WHERE soil_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT field_name, soil_type, soil_ph FROM fields WHERE soil_ph > 6.5;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples ORDER BY sample_date ASC;
SELECT rs.researcher_id, rr.result_description FROM researchers rs JOIN research_results rr ON rs.researcher_id = rr.researcher_id WHERE rs.research_area = 'Botany';
SELECT * FROM fields;
SELECT field_name, location FROM fields ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_date FROM soil_samples WHERE ph_level > 7.0;
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fields ORDER BY field_name DESC, location ASC
SELECT field_id, field_name, location FROM fields WHERE location='North'
SELECT AVG(ph_level), MIN(moisture_percentage), MAX(moisture_percentage) FROM soil_samples

SELECT research_projects.project_name, researchers.researcher_name, research_projects.start_date, research_projects.end_date, researchers.specialization FROM research_projects JOIN researchers ON research_projects.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id

SELECT fields.field_id, fields.field_name, soil_samples.sample_date, analysis_results.analysis_date, analysis_results.nutrient_level FROM fields JOIN soil_samples ON fields.field_id = soil_samples.field_id JOIN analysis_results ON soil_samples.sample_id = analysis_results.sample_id ORDER BY fields.field_id ASC
